name: Fallen London - Winking Isle Indicator 2018
description: This Style has kindly been updated by Tuxi to work with the shiny, updated FL UI of 2018. The old 'Fallen London - Winking Isle Contraband Indicator' no longer works and will be retired. In order to progress the Seeking Mr. Eaten's Name (SMEN) storyline on Winking Isle, it's necessary to NOT possess a long and frustrating list of items. This Style flags up Winking Isle contraband items on the Bazaar tab, so you can easily sell them.
additional_info:
Winking Isle Contraband is highlighted in red. This should only affect the Bazaar inventory list.

As supplied, the Style also highlights items involved in the more esoteric 'Who is Salt?' variant of SMEN, in blue. Possessing none of these items is necessary to obtain a Quality that unlocks the 'Who is Salt?' question, much later on.

If you have no interest in asking 'Who is Salt?', and wish to simply ask the Hate or Grieve questions, then you can simply delete everything beyond line 257, which reads 

/* OPTIONAL LOSSES (ONLY NEEDED FOR THE 'WHO IS SALT?' ENDING) */

...leaving the final bracket in place. 

As of the 6th of November 2017, there should be no SMEN-relevant items that aren't highlighted either in red or blue in the Bazaar.

Contraband Indicator is inspired by the Winking Isle Fire Sale Helper by mayexist, written by Vexpont with the aid of numerous people on the FL forums, and updated by Tuxi.
css:
@-moz-document domain("fallenlondon.com")
{
  
/* WINKING ISLE CONTRABAND INDICATOR: EFFICIENT PERDITION SINCE 1895 */
 
/*  RED HIGHLIGHT    = ESSENTIAL SALE FOR PROGRESSING ON THE ISLE, SET ALL THESE TO ZERO    */
/*  BLUE HIGHLIGHT   = SALE NECESSARY ONLY TO OBTAIN THE 'WHO IS SALT?' QUESTION            */
 
/* You also need 0 Favours: Society and Favours: the Docks */
 
 
    /* <<<<<<< You have set aside jewels and riches >>>>>>> */
li[data-quality-id="421"],      /* Fistful of Surface Currency */
li[data-quality-id="730"],      /* Twelve-Carat Diamond Ring */
li[data-quality-id="378"],      /* Shard of Glim */
li[data-quality-id="643"],      /* Sapphire */
li[data-quality-id="642"],      /* Venom-Ruby */
li[data-quality-id="449"],      /* Flawed Diamond */
li[data-quality-id="12186"],    /* Ostentatious Diamond */
li[data-quality-id="12188"],    /* Magnificent Diamond */
li[data-quality-id="12187"],    /* Fabulous Diamond */
 
    /* <<<<<<< You have given up your intrigues >>>>>>> */
li[data-quality-id="930"],      /* Rumourmonger's Network */  
li[data-quality-id="931"],      /* Intriguer's Compendium */
li[data-quality-id="858"],      /* Blackmail Material */
li[data-quality-id="659"],      /* Scrap of Incendiary Gossip */
li[data-quality-id="656"],      /* Inkling of Identity */
li[data-quality-id="740"],      /* Personal Recommendation */
li[data-quality-id="744"],      /* Favours in High Places */
li[data-quality-id="830"],      /* Compromising Document */
li[data-quality-id="588"],      /* Intriguing Snippet */
 
    /* <<<<<<< You have rejected wine and song >>>>>>> */
li[data-quality-id="24121"],    /* Vial of Masters' Blood */
li[data-quality-id="12350"],    /* Vial of Tears of the Bazaar */
li[data-quality-id="824"],      /* Bottle of Fourth City Airag: Year of the Tortoise */
li[data-quality-id="736"],      /* Cellar of Wine */  
li[data-quality-id="823"],      /* Bottle of Broken Giant 1844 */
li[data-quality-id="822"],      /* Bottle of Strangling Willow Absinthe */
li[data-quality-id="815"],      /* Bottle of Morelways 1872 */
li[data-quality-id="382"],      /* Bottle of Greyfields 1879 */
li[data-quality-id="473"],      /* Bottle of Greyfields 1868 First Sporing */
 
    /* <<<<<<< No map knows the place you go >>>>>>> */
li[data-quality-id="392"],      /* London Street Sign */
li[data-quality-id="959"],      /* Puzzling Map */
li[data-quality-id="956"],      /* Partial Map */
li[data-quality-id="920"],      /* Map Scrap */
 
    /* <<<<<<< No more sweet memories; no more bitter >>>>>>> */
li[data-quality-id="114982"],   /* Soothe & Cooper Long-Box */
li[data-quality-id="741"],      /* Bazaar Permit */
li[data-quality-id="945"],      /* Touching Love Story */
li[data-quality-id="827"],      /* Vision of the Surface */
li[data-quality-id="531"],      /* Romantic Notion */
li[data-quality-id="391"],      /* Drop of Prisoner's Honey */
 
    /* <<<<<<< You know nothing of Stone's light >>>>>>> */
li[data-quality-id="122492"],   /* Mountain-sherd */
li[data-quality-id="14975"],    /* Elemental Secret */
li[data-quality-id="832"],      /* Primaeval Hint */
li[data-quality-id="946"],      /* Antique Mystery */
li[data-quality-id="852"],      /* Presbyterate Passphrase */
li[data-quality-id="587"],      /* Mystery of the Elder Continent */
 
    /* <<<<<<< Your chiefest treasures are gone >>>>>>> */
li[data-quality-id="934"],      /* Breath of the Void */
li[data-quality-id="926"],      /* Veils-Velvet Scrap */
li[data-quality-id="106683"],   /* Fluke-Core */
li[data-quality-id="929"]       /* Reported Location of a One-Time Prince of Hell */
{
    color: #941515!important;
    background-color: #C9A4A1!important;
}
 
 
/* OPTIONAL LOSSES (ONLY NEEDED FOR THE 'WHO IS SALT?' ENDING) */
 
    /* <<<<<<< Tell the wind your stories >>>>>>> */
li[data-quality-id="525"],      /* Journal of Infamy */
li[data-quality-id="107903"],   /* A Sealed Copy of the Crimson Book */
li[data-quality-id="831"],      /* Zee-Ztory */
li[data-quality-id="828"],      /* Tale of Terror */
 
    /* <<<<<<< Forget Axile >>>>>>> */
li[data-quality-id="16308"],    /* Nodule of Fecund Amber */
li[data-quality-id="949"],      /* Nodule of Trembling Amber */
li[data-quality-id="754"],      /* Nodule of Pulsating Amber */
li[data-quality-id="810"],      /* Unearthly Fossil */
li[data-quality-id="385"],      /* Nodule of Deep Amber */
 
    /* <<<<<<< Unpick the warp, unpick the weft >>>>>>>  */
li[data-quality-id="381"],      /* Silk Scrap */
li[data-quality-id="907"],      /* Surface-Silk Scrap */
li[data-quality-id="915"],      /* Whisper-Satin Scrap */
li[data-quality-id="922"],      /* Thirsty Bombazine Scrap */
li[data-quality-id="923"],      /* Puzzle-Damask Scrap */
li[data-quality-id="924"],      /* Parabola-Linen Scrap */
li[data-quality-id="925"],      /* Scrap of Ivory Organza */
 
    /* <<<<<<< Let the messages fall by the road's edge >>>>>>> */
li[data-quality-id="936"],      /* Starstone Demark */
li[data-quality-id="933"],      /* Night-Whisper */
li[data-quality-id="849"],      /* Storm-Threnody */
li[data-quality-id="773"],      /* Aeolian Scream */
li[data-quality-id="932"],      /* Correspondence Plaque */
li[data-quality-id="935"],      /* Maniac's Prayer */  
li[data-quality-id="388"],      /* Primordial Shriek */
 
    /* <<<<<<< No more secrets. >>>>>>> */
li[data-quality-id="106142"],   /* Impossible Theorem */
li[data-quality-id="814"],      /* Dreadful Surmise */
li[data-quality-id="821"],      /* Searing Enigma */
li[data-quality-id="105858"],   /* Direful Reflection */
li[data-quality-id="812"],      /* Uncanny Incunabulum */
li[data-quality-id="809"],      /* Extraordinary Implication */
li[data-quality-id="390"],      /* Appalling Secret */
li[data-quality-id="389"],      /* Cryptic Clue */
li[data-quality-id="380"]       /* Whispered Hint */
{
    color: #0F335E!important;
    background-color: #C2C8D1!important;
}
/* END OF OPTIONAL 'WHO IS SALT' LIST. */
}
